meanings.definition: A tough, resistant polymer found in the walls of pollen grains.
meanings.sent1: The sporopollenins protect the pollen grains from damage.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the structure of sporopollenins in pollen grains.
meanings.sent3: The sporopollenins in the pollen grains were like tiny shields.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the sporopollenins in a pollen grain.
meanings.sent5: The sporopollenins formed a sturdy fortress around the pollen grain.

meanings.definition: The main component of the outer layer of pollen grains.
meanings.sent1: Bees collect pollen grains covered in sporopollenins.
meanings.sent2: The sporopollenins give pollen grains their protective outer layer.
meanings.sent3: The sporopollenins on the pollen grains sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His words were coated with sporopollenins of sincerity.
meanings.sent5: The sporopollenins on the pollen grains acted as a natural shield.
